extensionDescription.message: Menyorot secara visual sarang induk/anak DOM saat mengarahkan kursor ke elemen pada laman web.

toggleTooltip.description: Tooltip for the main toggle button.

settingsBtnTooltip.description: Tooltip for the settings gear button.

statusOn.description: Status text when the extension is enabled.

statusOff.description: Status text when the extension is disabled.

showLabelsDesc.message: Tampilkan tag elemen, id, dan informasi kelas saat melayang.
showLabelsDesc.description: Description for the show labels setting.

highlightParentsDesc.message: Sorot elemen induk dari elemen yang dilayangkan.
highlightParentsDesc.description: Description for the highlight parents setting.

highlightChildrenDesc.message: Sorot elemen anak langsung dari elemen yang dilayangkan.
highlightChildrenDesc.description: Description for the highlight children setting.

parentDepth.description: Setting to control how many parent levels to highlight.

parentDepthDesc.message: Berapa banyak level elemen induk yang harus disorot (1-5).
parentDepthDesc.description: Description for the parent depth setting.

colorScheme.description: Setting to select the color scheme.

colorSchemeTitle.description: Title for the color scheme section in options.

customColorsTitle.description: Title for the custom colors section.

hexLabel.description: Label for the hex color input.

resetCustomColors.description: Button to reset custom colors to default values.

legendHovered.description: Legend label for the hovered element color.

legendParent.description: Legend label for parent element colors.

legendChild.description: Legend label for child element colors.

footerPrivacyLink.description: Privacy policy link text in the footer.

optionsSubtitle.description: Subtitle on the options page header.

generalSettingsTitle.description: Title for the general settings section.

previewTitle.description: Title for the live preview section.

aboutLicense.message: Berlisensi di bawah Lisensi MIT. Gratis dan sumber terbuka.

sourceCodeLink.description: Link text for the GitHub source code.

savedStatus.description: Toast message when settings are saved.
